actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to take an agriculture census every five years.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Agriculture, beginning in the month of October 1979, and in same month of every fifth year thereafter, to take a census of agriculture.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to take an agriculture census every five years.
